pkgmetadata.longdescription: # dmbiolibLibrary of Python functions for bioinformaticsInstall from Bioconda:````conda install -c bioconda dmbiolib````Install from PyPI:````pip install dmbiolib````Full documentation: https://dmbiolib.readthedocs.io/GitHub issues (bug reports, feature requests): https://github.com/damienmarsic/dmbiolib/issues/new/choose[![install with bioconda](https://img.shields.io/badge/install%20with-bioconda-brightgreen.svg?style=flat)](http://bioconda.github.io/recipes/dmbiolib/README.html)[![dmbiolib documentation](https://img.shields.io/badge/dmbiolib-Documentation-yellow)](https://dmbiolib.readthedocs.io/)
